exceptions.onlyOneSendReportsJobAllowed: Only one 'Send anonymous error reports' job is allowed

messages.jobAlreadyExist: A job has been created less than a minute ago

tooltips.scheduling:
Crontab notation. Defines frequency of job runs.

*/5 * * * * - every 5 minutes

0 */2 * * * - every 2 hours

30 1 * * * - at 01:30 once a day

0 0 1 * * - on the first day of the month
